metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46342 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in X.Org. This security flaw occurs because thehandler for the XvdiSelectVideoNotify request may write to memory after ithas been freed. This issue can lead to local privileges elevation onsystems where the X se

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
